mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Seller ORDER BY sel_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into Seller (sel_idx, sel_title, sel_content, sel_date, sel_price, sel_category, sel_count, sel_state, mbr_idx, img_idx) values ( #{sel_idx}, #{sel_title}, #{sel_content}, #{sel_date}, #{sel_price}, #{sel_category}, #{sel_count}, #{sel_state}, #{mbr_idx}, #{img_idx})
mapper.update: UPDATE Seller SET sel_idx = #{sel_idx}, title = #{title}, sel_content = #{sel_content}, sel_date = #{sel_date}, sel_price = #{sel_price}, sel_category = #{sel_category}, sel_count = #{sel_count}, sel_state = #{sel_state}, mbr_idx = #{mbr_idx}, img_idx = #{img_idx} WHERE idx = #{idx}
